Patch the Pirate Clubs

A weekly choir and bible club.

Group: Preschoolers through sixth graders.

Leader: Adam McCaslin

Adam McCaslin serves as the youth pastor at Bible Baptist. A native of Dalton, GA and a graduate of the Crown College of the Bible, Adam is passionate about missions and evangelism.

(706) 847-8700

leonhart4@gmail.com

Patch Clubs is a weekly choir and Bible club that meets every Thursday night from 6:30-8:00pm. Clubbers learn Bible verses, play games, and learn character building music each week.

The club breaks down into two groups:

Patch Clubs

The Patch Club is for kids from 2nd Grade to 6th Grade.

Pee Wee Clubs

Our Pee Wee club is for children from age 3 to 1st grade.

Check back here for upcoming events, announcements and photos.
